g.title: G
g.text: FOSDEM 2024 large rooms video cabling setup:

a.xlink:title:
speaker microphone
sennheiser avx me2
esk avx bodypack transmitter
autonomy: 15h (BA30 battery)/11h (2x AA)
2030 mAh

audience microphone
sennheiser avx 835
autonomy: 13h (BA10 battery)/11h (2x AA)
2200 mAh
Sennheiser HD201 headphones\n3.5mm trs stereo male\nrental budgetcam
